r.d: Package for communicating with NNTP/Usenet servers
r.n: - This release is NOT fully backward compatible with v0.11.3, since experimental features (Net_NNTP_Message and Net_NNTP_Header and related methods Net_NNTP_Client::getArticle() and Net_NNTP_Client::getHeader()) have been removed. Users of those features should consider v1.2.x in stead.
